name: Blaster_Ranged.Dark_Blast
display_help: Dark Blast summons the powers of the Netherworld to defeat your foes. The draining effects of most of these powers can reduce your targets' chance to hit.

powers.name: Blaster_Ranged.Dark_Blast.Dark_Blast
powers.display_help: A long range blast of dark energy. Deals moderate Negative Energy damage and reduces the target's chance to hit. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

display_info: 6.60% strength to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 8.5s on self

powers.name: Blaster_Ranged.Dark_Blast.Gloom
powers.display_help: Gloom slowly drains a target of life, while reducing their chance to hit. Slower than Dark Blast, but deals more damage over time. Damage: High(DoT), Recharge: Moderate

display_info: 8 ticks of 13.76 negative energy damage over 3.6s on target
11.00% strength to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 9.17s on self
8 ticks of 18.17 negative energy damage over 3.6s on target

powers.name: Blaster_Ranged.Dark_Blast.Umbral_Torrent
powers.display_help: You summon a wave of mire that sweeps away foes within its arc. This attack deals moderate Negative Energy damage to foes, reduces their chance to hit and sends them flying. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Slow
powers.display_short_help: Ranged (Cone), Moderate DMG(Smashing), Foe -To Hit, Knockback

display_info.Effect Area: Cone — 80 ft. radius 30° arc (10 targets max)

display_info: 2.00% strength to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 8.53s on self

powers.name: Blaster_Ranged.Dark_Blast.Aim
powers.display_help: Greatly increases the chance to hit of your attacks for a few seconds. Slightly increases damage. Recharge: Long

display_info: 62.50% strength to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 10s on self

powers.name: Blaster_Ranged.Dark_Blast.Moonbeam
powers.display_help: An extremely long range and accurate beam of Negative Energy that deals tremendous damage and reduces the target's chance to hit. This is a sniper attack, and like most sniper attacks, is best fired from a distance as it can be interrupted. If you are engaged in battle this attack becomes instant-cast. If you are not engaged, it will do bonus damage. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow
powers.display_short_help: Sniper, Extreme DMG(Negative), Target -To Hit, Self +Range

powers.name: Blaster_Ranged.Dark_Blast.Tenebrous_Tentacles
powers.display_help: You can create a cone shaped rift to the Netherworld that allows its native creatures to slip their oily Tentacles into our reality. These creatures will snare all foes within range, Immobilizing them while the Tentacles drain their life and reduce their chance to hit. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Moderate
powers.display_short_help: Ranged (Cone), Moderate DMG(Negative/Smash), Foe Immobilize, -To Hit

display_info.Effect Area: Cone — 40 ft. radius 40° arc (10 targets max)

display_info: 8 ticks of 6.26 smashing damage over 7.1s on target after 1s delay
8 ticks of 1.64 smashing damage over 7.1s on target after 1s delay
4.80% strength to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 9.17s on self

powers.name: Blaster_Ranged.Dark_Blast.Abyssal_Gaze
powers.display_help: You gaze into your foe's eyes giving them a glimpse into the terrifying netherworld rendering them held, reducing their chance to hit and dealing High Negative Energy damage over the next couple of seconds. Damage: High, Recharge: Slow
powers.display_short_help: Ranged, High DoT(Negative), Foe Hold, -To Hit

display_info: 3 ticks of 29.53 negative energy damage over 2.1s on target
3 ticks of 60.75 negative energy damage over 2.1s on target
11.00% strength to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 9.17s on self

powers.name: Blaster_Ranged.Dark_Blast.Life_Drain
powers.display_help: You can tap the power of the Netherworld to steal some life from a target foe and reduce their chance to hit. Some of that stolen life is transferred to you in the form of Hit Points. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate
powers.display_short_help: Ranged, High DMG(Negative), Target -To Hit, Self +HP

display_info: 12.70% strength to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 9.43s on self

powers.name: Blaster_Ranged.Dark_Blast.Blackstar
powers.display_help: You can unleash a devastating blast of Negative Energy around yourself, dealing massive Negative Energy and Smashing damage and severely reducing affected foes' chance to hit. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Long

display_info: 4.20% strength to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 10.5s on self
